page.title: 11PENICUIK'S SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: Work on this new shopping area has included diverting the main road (A701) which once went straight through it to the High Street. At present ,June 1985, work is still in progress to make it a pedestrian precinct and during this work an old well has been discovered. The centre is supplied with a large car park beside the bigger supermarket and also ample parking spaces across the main road.There are 2 supermarket,3 bakers, 1 wine shop,1 greengrocer,1 frozen food shop,2 chemists,2 Estate agents, 1 bank,3 building societies,2 shoe shops,1 newsagent,2 clothes shops,1 electrical shop,1 home improvement shop,1 Oxfam shop,1 Post Office and 2 shops not yet occupied.There are also a Job Centre,a Citizen's Advice Bureau and the Salvation Army Hall.
